title: Textile, 1800–1850
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Mezzaro in a design of small scale serpentine branches on a white ground. Branches surrounded by and part of a floral design worked in minute black dots. Double floral border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1800–1850.
1800–1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-10.
